A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
If all you want is a solid character driven story in space where the stakes matter and the main characters have to make active choices and sacrifices in order to achieve their goals\, then this film is not for you. Every character is a mary sue\, every main character has plot armor and even a few of the side characters\, the motivations of each character are unclear and have no bearing on the story\, and more. 

 Don't be deceived by the positive reviews or the people just desperately looking for something to love. This is Breaking Bad's "The Fly" level bad\, which considering the writer/director\, should surprise no one. 

As such\, I consider it my civic duty to rate this film as the trash it was.
